# stickerSize

**Instance Property**

A constant that indicates the size of the stickers.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var stickerSize: MSStickerSize { get }
```

## Discussion

For a list of possible values, see [doc://com.apple.messages/documentation/Messages/MSStickerSize].

## Working with Stickers

- **init(stickerSize:)**: Creates a new sticker browser view controller with stickers of the provided size.
- **stickerBrowserView**: The sticker browser view managed by this controller.
